## Description
A clear description of the bug.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. See error

## Expected Behavior
What should have happened.

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened.

- **Browser**: (e.g., Chrome 120, Safari 17)
- **Device**: (e.g., Desktop, iPhone 15)
- **User Role**: (e.g., manager, user)
